miniwob.book-flight-nodelay.description: Books flights regularly for business trips, looking for loyalty program benefits and direct flights.
Searches for the cheapest flights, comparing different airlines and using flexible dates to find the best deals.
Books flights for the entire family, focusing on convenient flight times, seating arrangements, and kid-friendly options.
Books flights at the last minute, prioritizing availability and quick booking processes to secure a seat.
Looks for first-class or business-class flights with premium services, focusing on comfort and exclusivity.

miniwob.click-tab-2-hard.description: Constantly switches between tabs to manage multiple tasks simultaneously, such as research, communication, and work.
Uses tabs to organize different sources of information while conducting in-depth research on a specific topic.
Opens multiple tabs for entertainment, such as watching videos, reading articles, and browsing social media.
Uses tabs to manage different aspects of a project, keeping relevant documents, timelines, and communication channels open.

miniwob.choose-date-nodelay.description: Selects dates for events, coordinating with multiple participants and checking for conflicts with other planned activities.
Chooses travel dates, looking for the best combination of availability, weather, and pricing for flights and accommodations.
Schedules meetings or appointments, ensuring availability on both ends and aligning with the calendar.
Picks dates for academic deadlines, exam schedules, or project timelines, ensuring they fit within the academic calendar.

miniwob.click-checkboxes-soft.description: Uses checkboxes to manage a to-do list, marking tasks as completed throughout the day.
Selects multiple options in surveys or forms, ensuring all relevant choices are selected.
Uses checkboxes to verify or select specific entries in a database, ensuring accuracy and completeness.
Checks and unchecks options in settings menus to personalize software or application preferences.

miniwob.daily-calendar.description: Manages a packed schedule of meetings, appointments, and events, using the calendar to stay organized.
Tracks project deadlines, client meetings, and work hours, ensuring productivity and time management.
Uses the calendar to keep track of classes, assignments, and study sessions, balancing academic responsibilities.
Organizes family activities, school events, and appointments, ensuring everyone in the household stays on track.
Schedules daily workouts, meal plans, and health appointments, ensuring a balanced and healthy lifestyle.

miniwob.email-inbox.description: Manages a high volume of work emails, prioritizing important messages and responding quickly to clients and colleagues.
Receives daily newsletters on various topics, organizing them into folders for later reading.
Handles customer inquiries and support tickets via email, ensuring timely and accurate responses.
Checks for updates from professors, school administration, and peers, organizing emails related to assignments and exams.
Uses email for personal communication, reading and responding to messages from friends and family.

miniwob.login-user.description: Uses strong, unique passwords and two-factor authentication to log into accounts securely.
Logs into multiple accounts throughout the day, often using password managers to streamline the process.
Navigates the login process carefully, setting up a new account and learning how to access the system.
Manages multiple user accounts across different platforms, frequently switching between logins.
Logs in infrequently and often needs to reset passwords due to forgetting login credentials.

miniwob.navigate-tree.description: Explores project directories, searching for specific files or code snippets within a large repository.
Navigates file systems to manage server configurations, logs, and backups.
Organizes and navigates through large collections of design assets, images, and project files.
Accesses folders for different courses, assignments, and research papers, ensuring everything is well-organized.
Navigates through a hierarchy of video, audio, and text files, organizing content for production.

miniwob.order-food.description: Orders food quickly during a hectic workday, prioritizing speed, convenience, and healthy options.
Explores menus in detail, looking for unique dishes and reading reviews before placing an order.
Orders meals for the entire family, considering everyone's preferences and dietary restrictions.
Orders food late at night, often looking for comfort food or quick bites that are available 24/7.
Chooses meals based on nutritional information, focusing on balanced, low-calorie, or organic options.

miniwob.phone-book.description: Uses the phone book to find and contact potential clients, keeping track of business contacts and leads.
Accesses the phone book to quickly find customer information and contact details for resolving issues.
Uses the phone book to contact vendors, venues, and participants, coordinating event logistics.
Accesses contact information quickly in emergency situations, ensuring fast communication.
Uses the phone book to find friends and family contacts, staying in touch with loved ones.

miniwob.search-engine.description: Uses the search engine to find academic papers, articles, and data for in-depth research.
Searches for products, comparing prices, reading reviews, and finding the best deals online.
Uses the search engine to stay updated on current events, browsing the latest news and analysis.
Searches for a variety of topics, from entertainment to random trivia, satisfying curiosity.
Uses the search engine to find job listings, company information, and career advice.

miniwob.social-media-all.description: Uses social media to build a personal brand, engage with followers, and promote content or products.
Scrolls through feeds, likes posts, and interacts with friends and family, sharing occasional updates.
Manages social media accounts to market products or services, engaging with customers and promoting the business.
Posts regularly, focusing on creating engaging content, videos, and images for followers.
Uses social media to follow news outlets, staying updated on current events and public discussions.

miniwob.terminal.description: Uses the terminal to manage servers, configure systems, and troubleshoot issues.
Runs code, manages version control, and automates tasks using terminal commands.
Uses the terminal to run data analysis scripts, manage large datasets, and automate data processing tasks.
Uses the terminal to explore systems, find vulnerabilities, and run penetration tests.
Learns to use the terminal for coding assignments, system navigation, and managing files.

miniwob.text-editor.description: Uses the text editor to draft articles, books, or blog posts, focusing on content creation.
Writes and edits code, using the text editor for development projects and debugging.
Uses the text editor to take notes during meetings or lectures, organizing thoughts and key points.
Edits and revises documents, focusing on grammar, style, and clarity in the text editor.
Writes essays, reports, and assignments, using the text editor to format and organize academic work.

miniwob.tic-tac-toe.description: Plays tic-tac-toe for fun during breaks, enjoying the simplicity of the game.
Analyzes each move carefully, aiming to outsmart the opponent and win every game.
Plays tic-tac-toe as an introduction to basic strategy games, learning to recognize patterns.
Plays against friends or online opponents, focusing on improving skills and winning.
Uses tic-tac-toe to teach young students about strategy, planning, and fair play.

miniwob.use-autocomplete-nodelay.description: Relies on autocomplete to speed up typing, allowing for quicker communication and task completion.
Uses autocomplete to quickly find search terms, relying on suggestions to refine queries.
Uses autocomplete to fill out repetitive forms and entries, ensuring accuracy and efficiency.
Uses autocomplete for convenience in everyday tasks, like sending messages or filling out online forms.
Utilizes autocomplete to overcome writer’s block, getting suggestions for completing sentences or ideas.
